data.text: @Quicktake Latest per review studies showed that this number could be 70% lower if governments recommend ivermectin as drug to cure and prevent COVID. That number was confirmed by at least two separate studies with large cohorts.
@Quicktake Where did covid start? And how?
@Quicktake The real number is much less!
